aboutContent.title: Hello, my name is Neil Fenton
aboutContent.subtitle:
I'm a JavaScript developer from Toronto, Canada.

I specialize in AngularJS development.
aboutContent.description:
I'm interested in all things web. I want to learn the latest bleeding edge technologies. I don't want to become complacent, I want to always be evolving.

My primary focus is modern JavaScript and more specifically, modern web application development. I'm interested in building unique, enterprise-level web applications.

credentials.title: Ryerson University - 2005 to 2009
credentials.description: Bachelor of Fine Arts in Photographic Studies
